title: Your Ridiculously Reliables
description:
Talking Points

  • What's the one thing that you want to be known for?
  • How do figure out what you're ridiculously reliable at?
  • What do people expect from or get from you?
  • Who should you interview to become more self-aware?
  • What should you do once you uncover what others rely on you for?

Quotable Quotes

  • "Ask yourself, 'What do people get when they get me?'"—RM
  • "It's hard to read the label from inside the bottle."—JS (quoting unknown person)
  • "Double down on what makes you unique."—RM
  • "Sometimes people value qualities in you that you think are negatives."—RM

Links We Mentioned

  • The Brain Audit by Sean D'Souza
author: jstark@jonathanstark.com (Jonathan Stark and Rochelle Moulton)
